TEXT.TITLE: LANDMARK SAVINGS <LSA> COMPLETES OFFICE SALE
TEXT.BODY: Landmark Savings Association said it completed the sale of its Whitehall, Pa., office, including deposits of about 31 mln dlrs, to Parkvale Savings Association. Landmark said it realized a gain of about 1.1 mln dlrs on the sale. The price was not disclosed. Reuter
